field.label: Enable Nut
field.help: Enable or disable the nut service. If enabled, the system will shutdown when the UPS emits a low battery warning.

field.label: Service Mode
field.help: Set the service mode. Currently only standalone and netclient are available.

field.label: Listen Address
field.help: Set the addresses this service listen on.

field.label: Admin Password
field.help: Set the password for admin user "admin".

field.label: Monitor Password
field.help: Set the password for monitoring user "monuser".

field.label: Name
field.help: Set the name for the remote UPS.

field.label: IP Address
field.help: Set the IP address of the remote NUT server.

field.label: Port
field.help: Set the TCP port of the remote NUT server.

field.label: Username
field.help: Set the username of the remote NUT server.

field.label: Password
field.help: Set the password of the remote NUT server.
